name: Don't touch them balls
description:
WSAD or Arrow Keys, Caps or Mouse or Gamepad in Browser. Multitouch in Android (APK).

Strongly recommend to download the APK for use on android devices

I finally made it. I finished a Game in time. 

This Game is Corona Game Jam Entry. 

It features a lot of Balls and i hope you'll have a lot of fun playing it. Nowadays it's a good trait, not to touch anything.

I used  some CC0 sounds and a free Unity Asset for the floating Joystick.
